column4: hi, im new to Ubuntu and my sound does not work, i think that my sound card is not supported but i wondered if anyone had any ideas
What kind of graphics card is it?
sorry, what sound card? type: "b419kid: <message here>" to type to me
did you try different sound configs in ubuntu maybe?
Try a couple of setting if you haven't while I'm gone :)
sorry if you type "b419kid: <message>" the chat is going to fast for me it will be a bit easier :)

well if you double-click on the sound icon (top right corner) there is a bunch of settings in there- also go to system/preferences/sound for more settings, if you haven't already try a few of these  please do
<> aren't needed around message, just to show you
Try multi combinations. I have to go. I'll be back later tonight-
i think i have worked out how to fix my sound
as i am new to all this i have no idea how to actualy do it, can you give me a hand?
do you have the directions because you said you knew "how" to
i don't know how to adjust system files... nano then something sorry i forgot :0
